params.account: The address to receive the minted tokens.
params.amount: The amount of tokens to mint.

params.newMinter: The address of the new minter.

mint(address,uint256).notice: Mints `_amount` tokens to `_account`, only callable by the minter.

setMinter(address).notice: Sets a new minter address, only callable by the contract owner.
